00084 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 struct aiTexel
00090 {
00091     unsigned char b,g,r,a;
00092 
00093 #ifdef __cplusplus
00095     bool operator== (const aiTexel& other) const
00096     {
00097         return b == other.b && r == other.r &&
00098                g == other.g && a == other.a;
00099     }
00100 
00102     bool operator!= (const aiTexel& other) const
00103     {
00104         return b != other.b || r != other.r ||
00105                g != other.g || a != other.a;
00106     }
00107 
00109     operator aiColor4D() const
00110     {
00111         return aiColor4D(r/255.f,g/255.f,b/255.f,a/255.f);
00112     }
00113 #endif // __cplusplus
00114 
00115 } PACK_STRUCT;
00116 
00117 #include "./Compiler/poppack1.h"
00118 
00119 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 struct aiTexture
00134 {
00141     unsigned int mWidth;
00142 
00148     unsigned int mHeight;
00149 
00169     char achFormatHint[9];// 8 for string + 1 for terminator.
00170 
00180     C_STRUCT aiTexel* pcData;
00181 
00182 #ifdef __cplusplus
00183 
00189     bool CheckFormat(const char* s) const
00190     {
00191                 return (0 == ::strncmp(achFormatHint, s, sizeof(achFormatHint)));
00192     }
00193 
00194     // Construction
00195     aiTexture ()
00196         : mWidth  (0)
00197         , mHeight (0)
00198         , pcData  (NULL)
00199     {
00200         achFormatHint[0] = achFormatHint[1] = 0;
00201         achFormatHint[2] = achFormatHint[3] = 0;
00202     }
00203 
00204     // Destruction
00205     ~aiTexture ()
00206     {
00207         delete[] pcData;
00208     }
00209 #endif
00210 };
00211

00213 #ifdef __cplusplus
00214 }
